title: How to export and import Realms in Keycloak
content: This article discusses about Importing and Exporting Keycloak Realms using the latest product distribution which runs on a Quarkus runtime. Realm Set up Firstly, if you are new to Keycloak and Quarkus, we recommend checking this article which covers the basics: Getting started with Keycloak powered by Quarkus A Keycloak Realm is a space where ...
